# epicdylan.com

> Personal site for T. Dylan Daniel — consciousness researcher, web3 builder, psychology PhD student, author, and open source developer.

## About

Dylan Daniel is a PhD student in Cognition & Cognitive Neuroscience at Texas Tech University, researching consciousness, free energy principle, autopoiesis, and bioelectric intelligence. Also a web3 builder, DAO founder, and author.

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://epicdylan.com
- Books: https://epicdylan.com/books
- Blog: https://epicdylan.com/blog
- Research: https://epicdylan.com/research
- Projects (Web3 / DAOs): https://epicdylan.com/projects
- CV: https://epicdylan.com/cv
- Fitness: https://epicdylan.com/fitness
- Chess: https://epicdylan.com/chess

## Books

- "INEVITABLE: Distributed Cognition & Network Superintelligence" (2024, Whitney Morgan Media)
- "Formal Dialectics" (2018, Cambridge Scholars Publishing)

## Research Areas

- Free Energy Principle (Karl Friston)
- Autopoiesis (Varela & Maturana)
- Bioelectric Intelligence (Michael Levin)
- Homeostatic Feelings (Antonio Damasio)
- PFC-Amygdala dynamics, vigilance, emotion recognition

## Web3 Projects (Built by Dylan)

- PageDAO (Founder) — Web3 writers organization, founded 2021
- ABC DAO (Founder) — FOSS collective on Farcaster, built with Claude
- PizzaDAO (Original Member) — Global pizza community
- ArbMe (Designer & Builder) — DeFi arbitrage protocol on Base, built with Claude and Claude Code
- Alpha — Onchain AI agent product, handles market analysis and LP monitoring
- Readme Books — NFT book collection

## Contact

- Email: thomas.d.daniel@ttu.edu
- GitHub: https://github.com/ipfsnut
- Blog: https://paragraph.com/@epicdylan.eth
